name: 2024 12th Asia Conference on Mechanical and Materials Engineering
content: Publication: The registered and presented papers will be published in below listed journals of【Scientific.Net】collection, which is indexed by Scopus, etc. 【Materials Science Forum (MSF) (ISSN print 0255-5476/ISSN web 1662-9752)】 【Solid State Phenomena (SSP) (ISSN print 1012-0394/ISSN web 1662-9779)】 【Defect and Diffusion Forum (DDF) (ISSN print 1012-0386/ISSN web 1662-9507)】 【Key Engineering Materials (KEM) (ISSN print 1013-9826/ISSN web 1662-9795)】
